title: Program Manager, Developer Ecosystem
description: A problem isn’t truly solved until it’s solved for all. That’s why Googlers build products that help create opportunities for everyone, whether down the street or across the globe. As a Program Manager at Google, you’ll lead complex, multi-disciplinary projects from start to finish.
key_qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, a related technical field, or equivalent practical experience. 2 years of experience in program management.
preferred_qualifications: Experience in program management, community management with developers, and startup ecosystems. Ability to volunteer with external communities in leadership roles. Excellent organizational and project management skills, with the ability to manage multiple projects with competing priorities.
responsibilities: Plan strategy and execute the growth of quality metrics for first-party communities. Execute first-party community events like Annual Summits, IO Extended Campaign, and assist with IO connect India. Support Cloud engagements with communities/practitioners. Execute on Gemini AI and Cloud adoption. Plan format development and startup engagement.
